attributes.action: Pass a law which prevents employers from sacking employees based on the political party they vote for
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British police offers have been threatened with the sack based on the political party they choose to vote for.

Each and every member of our country should have the democratic right to vote for whichever political party they choose, with complete anonymity.

I propose that it become a criminal offense for an employer to punish an employee based on their political beliefs, and for votes to become truly anonymous.

rejection.details: Serving police officers cannot be members of certain political groups, but we are not aware of any cases of police being sacked or threatened with dismissal based on who they vote for. Voting remains a private matter which individuals do not have to disclose to employers or anyone else should they choose not to.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
